{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Satellite watching {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Satellite watching Satellite watching or satellite spotting is a hobby which consists of the observation and tracking of artificial satellites that are orbiting Earth. People with this hobby are variously called satellite watchers, trackers, spotters, observers, etc. Since satellites outside Earth's shadow reflect sunlight, those especially in low Earth orbit may visibly glint (or "flare") as they traverse the observer's sky, usually during twilight. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Satellite watching)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
